data.title: Early Round Mid Window Support / Info Denial Sky Smoke
data.description: Use this Sky Smoke to limit the options of Attackers in Mid, and create opportunities for your teammates in that area of the map.

data.title: A Site Retake Sky Smoke Placements
data.description: Use your smokes like this when retaking A Site. Follow hot the smokes are placed on screen to best limit the Attacker's options.

data.title: C Site Chokepoint Delay Sky Smoke + Incendiary
data.description: Use this Sky Smoke + Incendiary setup to delay people from pushing through the C Main chokepoint into C Site.

data.title: B Site Chokepoint Delay Sky Smoke + Incendiary
data.description: Use this Sky Smoke + Incendiary setup to delay people from pushing through the B Main chokepoint into B Site.
